content: if you have already purchased the pdf this update is available for free in your pattern library the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2025/05/arcanoweave-part-8 html this is part 8 of the arcanoweave doily the pattern continues where part 7 left off starting on round 118 and ending with round 127 the finished size measures about 48 in 122 cm here are links to the previous sections- part 1 arcane aura 1 part 2 incanter s insight 2 part 3 evocation 3 part 4 innervision 4 part 5 terrace of the magi 5 part 6 ethereal energy 6 part 7 sorcerer s soiree 7 materials needed size 10 crochet thread- for part 8- 1 400-1 500 yards for the entire doily- 4 500 yards 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors this crochet pattern is the original creation of julia hart of draiguna you are welcome to link directly to this pattern but please refrain from reproducing it on your own site items crafted from this pattern may be sold commercially however we ask that you acknowledge julia hart as the pattern s author and provide a link to the etsy shop- draiguna etsy com or blog- www draiguna com redistribution of this pattern whether by sale sharing or any means of distribution is strictly prohibited this includes the creation of derivative works such as charts graphs or instructional videos we appreciate your cooperation and support thank you © 2025 julia hart | draiguna 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ethereal-energy 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sorcerers-soiree
